name: TheGospelRadioNetwork
0:
”Alexa open the Gospel Radio Network”
”Alexa play the Gospel Radio Network”
”Alexa launch the Gospel Radio Network”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the gospel radio network
des: The Gospel Radio Network launched in January 2014 as a 24/7 internet radio station broadcasting sound gospel preaching throughout the world. This work is overseen by the elders of the Mount Vernon church of Christ in Mount Vernon, TX.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
